players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana's death is a tragedy. We must analyze who benefits. Charlie or Alice, share your thoughts."
You: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he is the mafia. Alice is trying to frame me to protect her mafia partner."
Charlie: "Alice is clearly the mafia trying to mislead us. I investigated Bob last night and he's clean. Alice is the only one making false claims here."
You: "Charlie is lying. My investigation confirmed he is the mafia. Bob is innocent."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of the unknown players? Charlie, same question - why investigate me, a claimed villager? One of you is lying."
